channel.title: [Shard] HazePkz
channel.description:
[center][img]http://img574.imageshack.us/img574/2154/hazepkz.png[/img][/center] [b][u]HazePkz[/u][/b] [i][b]Introduction[/b][/i]
Hello MoparScape Community! I have been coding for almost 4 years and I have consistently been fascinated by its evolution. I have been currently working on something extremely special. My developers and I have put unimaginable effort into it, to make it everyone's "perfect" server. The "perfect" server is everything a coder wishes for. In order to have the "perfect" server we need plenty of support and help with it.
Team
[ul][li]Eyeownyew - Lead Developer - Creative Design - Web Developer - GFX Designer[/li] [li]Omar - Lead Developer - Creative Design[/li] [li]Open[/li] [li]Open[/li] [li]Open[/li] [li]Open[/li] [li]Open[/li][/ul] We are only looking for 5 total team members. If you would like to apply, please use the following format: *Note, only positions open are: Client Coder(2), GFX Design(2), and Creative Design(1). [code] Age: Location: Position applying for: Previous experience: Reason for wanting to join: MSN: [/code] [i]Features[/i] Green = Finished. Orange = In progress. Red = Haven't started.
Combat
[ul][li]Melee[/li] [li]Perfect Timers[/li] [li]All specials (317/474)[/li] [li]All 317/474 Weapons[/li] [li]Ranged[/li] [li]Magic[/li][/ul] Skills
[ul][li]Combat[/li] [li]Prayer[/li] [li]Runecrafting[/li] [li]Agility[/li] [li]Herblore[/li] [li]Thieving[/li] [li]Crafting[/li] [li]Fletching[/li] [li]Slayer[/li] [li]Mining[/li] [li]Smithing[/li] [li]Fishing[/li] [li]Cooking[/li] [li]Firemaking[/li] [li]Woodcutting[/li] [li]Farming[/li][/ul] *Note: Every skill has been redone to give it a unique feeling.
Minigames
[ul][li]Barrows[/li][li]Duel Arena[/li] [li]Castle wars[/li][/ul]
Other Features
[ul][li]Multi-account login[/li][/ul]
[ul][li]A large amount of custom quests.. VERY large.[/li][/ul]
[ul][li]Path separation on log-in.[/li][/ul]
[ul][li]F2p/P2p Areas used specially[/li][/ul]
[ul][li]A gradual increase of experience..[/li][/ul]
If you don't know what I'm getting at in the "Other Features", you're clueless. Sadly, I won't post the actual reasoning for this development until someone can guess it.. So guess away :D
My MSN is [email]Justin.persinger@gmail.com[/email]. Please give feedback. :)
**I will have pictures up in under 12 hours.**

item.dc:creator: @eyeownyew Eyeownyew

[quote=“rash, post:17, topic:374831”]Age: 17
Location: Australia
Position applying for: GFX/Creative Design
Previous experience: 2 years working with rsps
Reason for wanting to join: Want a good project to work on
MSN: rs2training@hotmail.com

I was just wondering, what does creative design entail?[/quote]

Accepted.
Creative design… I will explain this to you on MSN.

[quote=“soul my maul, post:16, topic:374831”]Age: 14
Location: Sweden
Position applying for: Web Developer.
Previous experience: Coding for 3-4years
Reason for wanting to join: I want to work with a good project/RSPS i want to make the server #1
MSN: shemesani_96@hotmail.com

Ps: Omar are you arabic? Becasue my name is Ahmed so i thought you was arabic :)[/quote]

I will talk to you on MSN.

item.title: [Shard] HazePkz
item.dc:creator: @eyeownyew Eyeownyew
item.description:
@eyeownyew wrote:

[quote=“SunSpec221, post:12, topic:374831”]Why would you use a glitchy base.

Use PI or make your own base off a clear source, or even use a not very known source so not buggers or glitchers and do anything to it.

By the way Good Luck on the new rs remake ( <-- Thats my guess )[/quote]

If you’re saying choose PI over (now) Shard…

Oh boy oh boy.

Plus, even if you were talking about Battlescape, it is almost clear of bugs. I’ve used it plenty of times before, and I’m extremely experienced with it.

If you were talking about Delta, I agree 100%.

Read full topic

Your allowed to have a development thread for the same project in both board’s. It must fit the sectional rules though, at least that’s what Adam told me.

@Topic: Good luck with the development mate. You should get some media added.
[/quote]
No he had the same developement on the same thread (www.moparscape.com/smf.somethinghere.board,149.0.html

Anyway, what’s your base?[/quote]

item.title: [Shard] HazePkz
item.dc:creator: @eyeownyew Eyeownyew
item.description:
@eyeownyew wrote:

[center][/center]
HazePkz
Introduction

Hello MoparScape Community! I have been coding for almost 4 years and I have consistently been fascinated by its evolution. I have been currently working on something extremely special. My developers and I have put unimaginable effort into it, to make it everyone’s “perfect” server. The “perfect” server is everything a coder wishes for. In order to have the “perfect” server we need plenty of support and help with it.

Team

[ul][li]Eyeownyew - Lead Developer - Creative Design - Web Developer - GFX Designer[/li]
[li]Omar - Lead Developer - Creative Design[/li]
[li]Open[/li]
[li]Open[/li]
[li]Open[/li]
[li]Open[/li]
[li]Open[/li][/ul]
We are only looking for 5 total team members. If you would like to apply, please use the following format:
*Note, only positions open are: Client Coder(2), GFX Design(2), and Creative Design(1).

Age:
Location:
Position applying for:
Previous experience:
Reason for wanting to join:
MSN:

Features
Green = Finished.
Orange = In progress.
Red = Haven’t started.

Combat

[ul][li]Melee[/li]
[li]Perfect Timers[/li]
[li]All specials (317/474)[/li]
[li]All 317/474 Weapons[/li]
[li]Ranged[/li]
[li]Magic[/li][/ul]
Skills

[ul][li]Combat[/li]

Other Features

If you don’t know what I’m getting at in the “Other Features”, you’re clueless.
Sadly, I won’t post the actual reasoning for this development until someone can guess it… So guess away
